alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Herkimer County through 315 PM EDT... At 250 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Yorkville to near Unadilla Forks. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Mohawk, Frankfort, Ohio, West Winfield, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Cold Brook, Jordanville, Northwood, Cedarville, Russia, Fairfield, Elizabethtown, Warren, Norway and Spinnerville. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern New York.
